text: Pitt Street railway station is a future underground rapid transit station located in the central business district of Sydney, Australia. The station forms part of Transport for New South Wales's Sydney Metro City & Southwest scheme. It is scheduled to open in 2024.Pitt Street Station Sydney Metro Retrieved 30 January 2019 ==References== ==External links== *Pitt Street Metro station Sydney Metro Category:Proposed railway stations in Sydney Category:Railway stations scheduled to open in 2024
title: Pitt Street railway station
